Name: Closing Argument
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A mezcal-based Last Word . It works! End of argument.
Nutrition: One serving of Closing Argument contains 181 calories
